snippet: The Supreme Court had ordered the former president, Chun Doo-hwan, to repay money it said he had illegally accumulated in the 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court had ordered the former president, Chun Doo-hwan, to repay money it said he had illegally accumulated in the 1980s.

headline.main: Prosecutors Raid Home of Former South Korean President
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Raid Home of Former South Korean President
